msbt.message: Forgot about our arrangement, did you?<10_4 /> Gahaha! That's OKâ€” I fell asleep anyway.
Oh, ! Consarn it, I invited you over, didn't I?Well, somethin' came up and I'm gonna have to formally cancel. Sorry 'bout that. I'll make it up to you, just you watch. Don't bet against old !

Oh no! I knew I was forgettin' somethin' I missed our get- together, didn't I? Sorry I couldn't make it, but I promise I'll make it up to you.You can count on your pal , today's events notwithstanding!
